Question: If [this person's] sin was his lifelessness, it was his sinfulness that brought him to life".
Hints: As an only child, this person became close to both parents and formed an unusually tight bond with his mother.
On the set of Jailhouse Rock, this person granted him an interview, though he was no longer dealing with the mainstream press.
